scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path --indent-type tab --output-style compact scss/den-base.scss html-v2/css/den-base.css && node-sass --include-path --indent-type tab --output-style compact scss/den-home.scss html-v2/css/den-home.css && node-sass --include-path --indent-type tab --output-style compact scss/den-work.scss html-v2/css/den-work.css
